meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Elliot Yates Mike Blaha Vaughn Winchell Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6975.

div.div:
Vaughn Winchell game 6.
Elliot Yates game 1.

td.p: Elliot Yates, an opera producer from New York, New York
Mike Blaha, an attorney originally from Homestead, Florida
Vaughn Winchell, a stay-at-home dad and graduate student from Columbia, Maryland (whose 5-day cash winnings total $103,103)

tr.td: IN MY CABINET
(Alex: You have to identify the president for us.)
5-LETTER WORDS
PLACES THAT END IN "IA"
POLICE LINGO
LATIN IN PLANT NAMES
& THE HORSE YOU RODE IN ON!

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Eliot: Who is Bush?)

(Barack) Obama

VaughnElliot
')
